n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: prompt --application/shared_components/security/authorizations/administration_rights begin -- Manifest -- SECURITY SCHEME: Administration Rights -- Manifest End wwv_flow_imp.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2022.10.07' ,p_release=>'22.2.0' ,p_default_workspace_id=>1122334455 ,p_default_application_id=>105 ,p_default_id_offset=>0 ,p_default_owner=>'APEX22' ); wwv_flow_imp_shared.create_security_scheme( p_id=>wwv_flow_imp.id(4413107131777509) ,p_name=>'Administration Rights' ,p_scheme_type=>'NATIVE_FUNCTION_BODY' ,p_attribute_01=>'return true;' ,p_error_message=>'Insufficient privileges, user is not an Administrator' ,p_caching=>'BY_USER_BY_PAGE_VIEW' ); wwv_flow_imp.component_end; end; /
